name: FIND ALL
description:
A game to find cute cats, raccoons and dogs in the city. Find all the hidden objects in a small black and white city by coloring it along the way. Game for all ages.

Features of the game:
- Many different items to find
- Finding items you will paint the city
- Effect 2.5D
- Cute cats, raccoons and dogs

P.S. We also have a crocodile :)
